name: ObjectArrayIterator_nextTest
description: Unit tests for the next method of ObjectArrayIterator.

test_cases.name: testNextWithElements
test_cases.description: Tests the next method of ObjectArrayIterator when there are elements in the array.

test_cases.name: testNextThrowsNoSuchElementException
test_cases.description: Tests that the next method of ObjectArrayIterator throws NoSuchElementException when there are no more elements.

test_cases.name: testNextAfterReset
test_cases.description: Tests the next method of ObjectArrayIterator after resetting the iterator.

test_cases.name: testNextWithCustomStartIndex
test_cases.description: Tests the next method of ObjectArrayIterator with a custom start index.

test_cases.name: testNextWithCustomRange
test_cases.description: Tests the next method of ObjectArrayIterator with a custom range.
